data.partBlankContent: In 2003, Tesla Motors began a new era of electric vehicles. Much li__ Apple, Tesla to__ special ca__ to cr___ a pro____ that sati_____ the tech_____ objective o_ creating a_ electric veh____ and al__ the soc___ need o_ having a visually appe_____ product. data.fullContent: In 2003, Tesla Motors began a new era of electric vehicles. Much like Apple, Tesla took special care to craft a product that satisfies the technical objective of creating an electric vehicle and also the social need of having a visually appealing product. The result is a series of cars with a sports car exterior and a high-tech interior, complete with a large touch-screen display and entirely digital interfaces.
data.answer: 2003年，特斯拉汽车公司开始了电动汽车的新时代。就像苹果公司一样，特斯拉特别用心地设计了一款产品，既能满足制造电动汽车的技术目标，又能满足社会对拥有视觉吸引力产品的需求。其结果是一系列拥有跑车外观和高科技内饰的汽车，配有一个大触摸屏显示屏和全数字界面。
